documents.document: Probably. Such a naughty boy. https://t.co/YDfqbYCIhf

Excited to be speaking at @ioftweets Fundraising Convention 2017 with #alicedevitt. #IoFFC #thebarbican https://t.co/200MW0zZAM
I can hear it now. https://t.co/RuxJQg5H0E
@JackieLeonard01 @JamesCoombes Not just improper but VERY improper. Blimey, you're ambitious.
@JackieLeonard01 Now you're being silly. @JamesCoombes would never cameo in that. He's a proper thespian.
@JackieLeonard01 Overegged Wigan? Wish I'd heard that. But I'm watching the telly. It's got pictures.
Just watching Francis Bacon – A Brush with Violence. Crazy.
@SlaterKingPhoto I can see the headline. 'Rampaging rasta'.
@SlaterKingPhoto Might have been different if they'd let you play with a machine gun.
Way better than theatre scrubs. https://t.co/KZGxcUCw1K

Now I've see a bloke in an elf outfit. The briefcase ruined it.
Just seen a bloke in a Christmas jumper with OH DEER! on the back. Ho, ho, ho.
My Christmas list. Scroll down and have a chuckle. https://t.co/jcdW5LTO5f
Girls give FA red card over advice to get them into football. Never rely on 'research and feedback'. https://t.co/QfDP52O3Im
AA Gill said, 'Facts are what pedantic, dull people have instead of opinions'. And that's a fact.
Just had an email from a bloke who says his company is a 'video content creation solution'. WTF.
@JamesCoombes Oh, good point. They couldn't give a discount because two packs would have to be two quid.
This woman just gave Donald Trump the Twitter smack down of the year https://t.co/INK7thOEGL Bloody glorious.
This is beautiful. It's from Peter Pan. "You know that place between asleep and awake, the place where you can still...
...remember dreaming? That's where I'll always love you. That's where I'll be waiting."
